replies.bodyText: In general, I have been favoring the manual catching, mainly because the ExpectedException only works with 1 exception per test. It is common that tests might expect multiple exceptions in a test, so I tend to manually catch the Exception. In these specific tests, we only deal with 1 Exception, so ExpectedException would have worked, but I usually avoid using it because of that limitation.
